name: Tweet Tweet Typer
description:
Sometimes it feels like the only thing keeping you from making friends is that you keep opening your stupid mouth.

So say all the words you can in this two tweet sized typing game made for #TweetTweetJam. Keep all those pesky good vibs at bay by typing out the word under them before they reach you at the bottom of the screen.

Almost all the words are pronounceable! It sounds like a sarcastic robot when you speak, 10/10 realism!
